body_html:
can you do:

gdb python

and in gdb:

r main.py

And when segfault happens, you can type:

where

Then it will show a stack-trace. Can you paste that here. It'll be helpful to figure out the issue.

Thanks.
body_text:
can you do:
gdb python

and in gdb:
r main.py

And when segfault happens, you can type:
where

Then it will show a stack-trace. Can you paste that here. It'll be helpful to figure out the issue.
Thanks.
body:
can you do:

```
gdb python
```

and in gdb:

```
r main.py
```

And when segfault happens, you can type:

```
where
```

Then it will show a stack-trace. Can you paste that here. It'll be helpful to figure out the issue.

Thanks.
